com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util

Class TextViewUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.util.TextViewUtil

  • public class TextViewUtil
extends Object
    Helper methods for manipulating TextView objects.

    • Method Detail

      • setAlignment

        public static void setAlignment(TextView textview,
                int alignment,
                boolean centerVertically)
        TextView alignment setter.
        Parameters:
        alignment - one of Component.ALIGNMENT_NORMAL, Component.ALIGNMENT_CENTER or Component.ALIGNMENT_OPPOSITE
        centerVertically - whether the text should be centered vertically

      • setBackgroundColor

        public static void setBackgroundColor(TextView textview,
                      int argb)
        TextView background color setter. Generally, the caller will not pass Component.COLOR_DEFAULT, instead substituting in the appropriate color.
        Parameters:
        textview - text view instance
        argb - background RGB color with alpha

      • isEnabled

        public static boolean isEnabled(TextView textview)
        Returns the enabled state a TextView.
        Parameters:
        textview - text view instance
        Returns:
        true for enabled, false disabled

      • setEnabled

        public static void setEnabled(TextView textview,
              boolean enabled)
        Enables a TextView.
        Parameters:
        textview - text view instance
        enabled - true for enabled, false disabled

      • getFontSize

        public static float getFontSize(TextView textview)
        Returns the font size for a TextView.
        Parameters:
        textview - text view instance
        Returns:
        font size in pixel

      • setFontSize

        public static void setFontSize(TextView textview,
               float size)
        Sets the font size for a TextView.
        Parameters:
        textview - text view instance
        size - font size in pixel

      • setFontTypeface

        public static void setFontTypeface(TextView textview,
                   int typeface,
                   boolean bold,
                   boolean italic)
        Sets the font typeface for a TextView.
        Parameters:
        textview - text view instance
        typeface - one of @link Component#TYPEFACE_DEFAULT}, Component.TYPEFACE_SERIF, Component.TYPEFACE_SANSSERIF or Component.TYPEFACE_MONOSPACE
        bold - true for bold, false for not bold
        italic - true for italic, false for not italic

      • getText

        public static String getText(TextView textview)
        Returns the text for a TextView.
        Parameters:
        textview - text view instance
        Returns:
        text shown in text view

           String text)
        Sets the text for a TextView.
        Parameters:
        textview - text view instance
        text - new text to be shown
